sentences.en: Aspheric optical parts manufacturing is an acknowledged difficulty and it is uneconomical.
sentences.cn: 非球面光学零件加工是当前国内外公认的难题.

sentences.en: Even the successful flying boats proved, in the end, uneconomical.
sentences.cn: 即使是成功的水上飞机最终也未能盈利。

sentences.en: It would be uneconomical to send a brand new tape.
sentences.cn: 寄一盘新磁带过去不合算。

sentences.en: Now this time of Yichang to Shanghai by train uneconomical.
sentences.cn: 现在这个季节上海到宜昌坐火车不合算.

sentences.en: The conclusion is that using gravity retaining wall alone will be comparatively uneconomical.
sentences.cn: 单纯采用重力式挡土墙是不经济的.

sentences.en: The methods employed are old-fashioned and uneconomical.
sentences.cn: 采用的方法很老套，没什么效益。

words.tran_cn: 不经济的；浪费的；不节俭的

trans.tran_cn: 浪费的，效率低的，不节约的
trans.tran_en: using too much effort, money, or materials to make a profit
